subject: Automobile Racing
Accidents and Safety
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon survived a shocking end to the Bank of America 500, losing the lead as his car sputtered, only to hang on after the leader Ryan Newman crashed with three laps to go in regulation.
snippet: Jeff Gordon survived a shocking end to the Bank of America 500, losing the lead as his car sputtered, only to hang on after the leader Ryan Newman crashed with three laps to go in regulation.
